answer_generation.query: I want to surprise my friend with a unique gift for her birthday. Can you suggest some rewards available on the Rewards as a Service platform? Also, fetch a random kitten image to add some cuteness factor to the gift. Lastly, provide me with the order history for my account to see if I have any pending orders.
